level.text: This chapter shall apply through September 30, 2013.
Beginning on October 1, 2013, this chapter shall apply upon the inclusion of its fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan.

level.heading: Effect of amendments
level.text: The 2012 amendment by D.C. Law 19-168 added the subsection (a) designation; substituted “through September 30, 2013” for “upon the inclusion of its fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan” in (a); and added (b).

level.heading: Temporary legislation
level.text: For temporary (225 days) addition of D.C. Law 20-155, § 7010b, see § 2(j) of the Fiscal Year 2015 Budget Support Clarification Temporary Amendment Act of 2014 (D.C. Law 20-179, March 7, 2015, 62 DCR 424).

level.heading: Emergency legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section 701 of D.C. Law 19-345, see § 7009 of Fiscal Year 2013 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2012 (D.C. Act 19-383, June 19, 2012, 59 DCR 7764).
For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 7009 of Fiscal Year 2013 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2012 (D.C. Act 19-413, July 25, 2012, 59 DCR 9290).

For temporary (90 days) repeal of D.C. Law 19-142, § 701, see § 7010b of the Fiscal Year 2015 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20-449, October 10, 2014, 61 DCR 10915, 20 STAT 4188).

For temporary (90 days) addition of D.C. Law 20-155, § 7010b, repealing D.C. Law 19-142, § 701, see § 2(k) of the Fiscal Year 2015 Budget Support Clarification Emergency Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20-461, November 6, 2014, 61 DCR 11784, 20 STAT 4368).

For temporary (90 days) repeal of D.C. Law 19-142, § 701, see § 7010b of the Fiscal Year 2015 Budget Support Second Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20-566, January 9, 2015, 62 DCR 884, 21 STAT 541).

For temporary (90 days) addition of D.C. Law 20-155, § 7010b, repealing D.C. Law 19-142, § 701, see § 2(k) of the Fiscal Year 2015 Budget Support Clarification Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20-587, January 13, 2015, 62 DCR 1294, 21 STAT 758).

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 19-142
level.text: For history of Law 19-142, see notes under § 38-751.01.

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 19-168
level.text: Law 19-168, the “Fiscal Year 2013 Budget Support Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-743. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 15, 2012, and June 5, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 22, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-385 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-168 became effective on September 20, 2012.

level.heading: Editor’s notes
level.text: Section 7016 of D.C. Law 19-168 provided that Sections 7001, 7004, 7007, 7009, 7011, and 7015 of the act shall apply as of June 19, 2012.
